title: Promotion Large 3 BR House with Hilltop View Close to Downtown Austin
posting_body: ['Special Promotion!!', 'LARGE BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED SINGLE-FAMILY HOUSE ON A HILLTOP WITH A GREAT VIEW - CLOSE TO DOWNTOWN AUSTIN!', '9015 Magna Carta Loop,', 'Austin, TX 78754', 'Lance', 'Call Today:', 'show contact info', '3 BD / 2.5 BA', '$2295.00', '(per month)', 'Deposit: $2595.00', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Date Available:8/1/2022', 'Square Footage: 2000 sq.ft.', 'MOVING SPECIAL, Price Just Drop to $2295!!', 'Beautifully designed single-family house in  Colonial Place community, close to HWY 290 E and Springdale in Austin3 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms, around 2000 square feet, 2 story 9015 Magna Carta Loop, Austin, TX 78754What a great floor plan!', 'Beautiful living room with a gas fireplace, a formal dining area, and a big kitchen with range, dishwasher, disposal, and microwave!', 'There is also a utility room with washer and dryer hooks.', 'Very nice hill-top view.', 'Huge backyard/side yard with no other houses on the side and in front.', 'Very quiet nationhood with a playground for kids.', 'Free Time Warner Premium Cable (with over 100+ channels) included in rent.', 'Conveniently located just off Hwy 290 E and Springdale.', 'Very close to downtown Austin, schools, churches, and shopping.', 'A breeze to the downtown area.', 'Must see to appreciate.', 'Pets', '( Depend on individual pet )', 'Move In Special', 'Price just reduced!', 'Only $2295 now!', 'Lease Description', 'Per Adult', 'Restrictions', 'Smoking Outside Only', 'Parking Details', '2 Garage Parking Spot', 'Amenities', 'Kitchen', 'Breakfast Nook', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Island', 'Microwave', 'Pantry', 'Stove', 'Flooring', 'Vinly Flooring', 'Rooms', 'Dining Room', 'Living Room', 'Utility Room', 'Amenities', 'Air Conditioning', 'Blinds', 'Cable Ready', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Central Vacuum', 'Fireplace', 'Walk In Closets', 'Washer / Dryer Hookups', 'Outdoor', 'Deck', 'Patio', 'Porch', 'Community', 'Playground']
